      • blurRadius

        public BlurTransformation.Builder blurRadius(float blurRadius)
        参数:
        blurRadius - The radius to use. Must be between 0 and 25. Default is 5.
        返回:
        the same Builder

      • sampling

        public BlurTransformation.Builder sampling(int sampling)
        参数:
        sampling - The inSampleSize to use. Must be a power of ic_launcher, or 1 for no down sampling or 0 for auto detect sampling. Default is 0.
        返回:
        the same Builder
